formulas.description: Assigned priority level based on severity
formulas.name: PriorityLevelValue
SubjectName
formulas.expression: IF( {!X1_Are_you_reporting_a_violation_of_Prosci_s_acceptable_use_policy}= "Yes", "New Incident Response "+ "Improper Use of Prosci Systems/Data"+", Sev Level: "+RIGHT(TEXT({!SeverityScore}), 1), "New Incident Response "+ {!Incident_Categories} +", Sev Level: "+RIGHT(TEXT({!SeverityScore}), 1))

recordCreates.label: Create a Case - Incident Response

recordLookups.description: Retrieve record type id for incident case
recordLookups.name: Get_Record_Type_Id
recordLookups.label: Get Record Type Id

fields.name: X1_Are_you_reporting_a_violation_of_Prosci_s_acceptable_use_policy
fields.fieldText: Are you a reporting violation of Prosci's acceptable use policy?

fields.name: YourNameText
fields.fieldText: Your Name: {!UserFullName}

fields.name: YourEmailAddressText
fields.fieldText: Your Email Address: {!$User.Email}

fields.name: How_was_incident_discovered
fields.fieldText: How was incident discovered?

fields.name: X4_When_was_the_incident_discovered
fields.fieldText: When was the incident discovered?

fields.name: Incident_Categories
fields.fieldText: Which of the following categories describes your incident best (see descriptions below)?
fields.helpText:
1. Malware - This includes phishing attacks, unauthorized software and other external malware (2.0)

2. System Outage/Performance Issue - Is a system not working at all or part of the system not working as expected? (1.0)

3. Improper use of Prosci systems/data - Loss/theft of equipment, suspected unauthorized access, violation of InfoSec Policies)

fields.name: Type_of_Malware
fields.fieldText: Specifically what type of Malware?

fields.name: Malware_Description
fields.fieldText: Malware Description

fields.name: X7_Have_you_clicked_on_any_links_in_the_phishing_email
fields.fieldText: Have you clicked on any links in the phishing email?

fields.name: Is_this_an_outage_or_a_performance_issue
fields.fieldText: Is this an outage or a performance issue

fields.name: Outage_Performance_Issue_Description
fields.fieldText: Outage/Performance Issue Description

fields.name: X9_What_type_of_improper_use_of_Prosci_Systems_Data
fields.fieldText: What type of improper use of Prosci Systems/Data

fields.name: Improper_Use_of_Systems_Data_Description
fields.fieldText: Improper Use of Systems/Data Description

fields.name: X10_What_System_systems_are_involved
fields.fieldText: What primary system is involved?

fields.name: X11_What_technology_is_the_incident_related_to
fields.fieldText: What technology is the incident related to?

fields.name: X12_What_is_Prosci_at_risk_of_with_this_incident_Please_see_descriptions_below_a
fields.fieldText: What is Prosci at risk of with this incident? Please see descriptions below and select all that apply:
fields.helpText:
1. Security - Someone is trying/has breached Prosci’s technology systems 1.5

2. Privacy - Someone has breached Prosci’s technology systems  and is trying/has accessed data 2.0

3. Business Continuity – Some/all of Prosci Employees can't fully complete their duties 1.0

fields.name: Prosci_Risk_Description
fields.fieldText: Prosci Risk Description

fields.name: X13_Are_you_already_aware_that_someone_has_unauthorized_access_to_Prosci_s_techn
fields.fieldText: Are you already aware that someone has unauthorized access to Prosci’s technology systems?

fields.name: X14_Are_you_already_aware_that_someone_has_unauthorized_access_to_Prosci_s_data
fields.fieldText: Are you already aware that someone has unauthorized access to Prosci’s data?

fields.name: X15_How_many_people_are_affected_by_this_incident
fields.fieldText: How many people are affected by this incident?
